content: These are: one, the semantic of hybrid work in the post-COVID era, which in turn reinforces the need for cloud-based communications platforms; two, ongoing adoption of mobility by businesses worldwide that drives the need for solutions that enable work in any mode, on any device, from anywhere; three, Microsoft Teams in the enterprise, which creates a meaningful opportunity for well-integrated enterprise-grade UCaaS and CCaaS solutions; and four, continued preference from CIOs to evolve to cloud-based unified communications and contact center as an integrated solution from a single provider.
